aka: The Greatest Country in the World

cast.name: 谢尔比·吉恩-巴蒂斯特 Schelby Jean-Baptiste

trans_title: The Greatest Country in the World
introduction: In a province not so distant from ours, now controlled by a far-right government, the borders are closed and immigrants, now under threat, are desperate to get out. A Haitian woman hands over her young son to a thirty-something Quebec man before fleeing. With help from a Vietnamese former refugee, they try to solve the mystery. Ky Nam Le Duc makes further inroads into his quest to diversify our cinematic landscape. A delicately sketched, enigmatic work, chilling in its topicality, where mistrust reigns and love blossoms where you least expect it.
